title: Jacobson And Glazer Take 'Broad City' On The Road
teaser: Real-life friends and comedians Abbi Jacobsen and Ilana Glazer star in Broad City, about two flawed women navigating New York City in their 20s. NPR's Rachel Martin caught up with them on tour.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
